---
title: "Arsenal Match Tracker"
format: html
---

```{=html}
<style>
table { width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; }
th, td { padding: 8px 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid #ddd; }
th { text-align: left; }
tbody tr:hover { background: transparent; }
.small { font-size: 0.9rem; color:#666; }

/* Result pills */
.pill { padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 999px; font-weight:600; font-size:0.9rem; display:inline-block; }
.win  { background:#e8f7ec; color:#0f8243; }
.draw { background:#fff7e6; color:#a66300; }
.loss { background:#ffecec; color:#b30021; }

/* Opponent cell with a small crest */
.opponent { display:inline-flex; align-items:center; gap:8px; white-space:nowrap; }
.crest { width:18px; height:18px; border-radius:50%; object-fit:cover; vertical-align:middle; }

</style>
```

> Kickoff times shown in Los Angeles time
